text: Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ sacchikātabba nti me bhikkhave pubbe pe udapādi
edit: Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ sacchikātabba nti me bhikkhave pubbe pe udapādi

translations.transtext: Monks, vision, insight, ... thus, "That cessation of suffering as a noble truth should be experienced."
